devilFruits.name: ゴムゴムの実 (Gomu Gomu no Mi)
devilFruits.description: The Gomu Gomu no Mi grants the user a body made of rubber, making them immune to conventional blunt attacks.

devilFruits.name: メラメラの実 (Mera Mera no Mi)
devilFruits.description: The Mera Mera no Mi allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will.

devilFruits.name: ゾゾの実 (Zo Zo no Mi)
devilFruits.description: The Zo Zo no Mi is a Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into various animals and hybrid forms.
